articles.title: US generals say they recommended leaving 2,500 troops in Afghanistan - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Top US generals said Tuesday that they advised keeping American troops in Afghanistan to bolster the Afghan government and expressed concern that the Taliban has not severed ties with Al-Qaeda.
articles.content: Taliban forces swiftly took over the airport in Kabul after the US military pulled out of Afghanistan in late August, 2021Top US generals said Tuesday that they advised keeping American troops in Afg… [+612 chars]

articles.title: Fossilized Footprints Push Back Date of Human Arrival in Americas - ExtremeTech
articles.description: A discovery of preserved human footprints in White Sands National Park in New Mexico has pushed the timeline back by thousands of years.
articles.content: Scientists believe that the first beings we could call modern humans emerged in Africa some 300,000 years ago. Over the millennia, Homo sapiens expanded across the world but didn’t reach North Americ… [+2348 chars]

articles.title: White House defends Biden's remarks Indian media is ‘better behaved' than US press - Times of India
articles.description: US News: WASHINGTON: The White House has tried to pacify an upset American media over Joe Biden's off the cuff remarks that the Indian press is "better behaved.
